byline.contributor: Alison Smale reported from Vienna, and Melissa Eddy from Berlin. Palko Karasz contributed reporting from London.
byline.original: By ALISON SMALE and MELISSA EDDY

abstract: Truck containing bodies of up to 50 smuggled migrants is found near Vienna, underscoring scope and complexity of migration crisis in Europe; European Union leaders are faced with human traffickers who are exploiting free movement between 28-nation bloc.
lead_paragraph: A truck filled with the decomposing bodies of migrants was found in Austria as European leaders were meeting nearby to devise ways to cope with the migration crisis.

headline.main: Grisly Discovery in Migrant Crisis Shocks Europe
headline.print_headline: Migrant Crisis Grows in Europe With Grisly Find

snippet: A truck filled with the decomposing bodies of migrants was found in Austria as European leaders were meeting nearby to devise ways to cope with the migration crisis.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
